alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Togo, or 19 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties, including the following locations... Side Lake, Snake Trail, Stony Brook, Perch Lake, Mcarthy Beach State Park and Stingy Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
